scenes.name: WelcomeScene
assets: `assets/player.png`: Sprite sheet for player animations (32x48 per frame)
objectives: Understand the company culture of ACME Corp.
Recognize the importance of innovation, collaboration, and integrity.
Learn about the company's commitment to diversity, inclusion, and customer-first approaches.
Appreciate the value of continuous learning and work-life balance.

scenes.name: CoreValuesScene
assets: `assets/collectSound.mp3`: Sound effect for collecting a core value
objectives: Understand and remember ACME's core values: Innovation, Integrity, Excellence, Teamwork, and Customer Focus.
Recognize the importance of each value through visual and interactive feedback.
Associate positive actions (collecting values) with learning and reinforcing these core concepts.

scenes.name: BenefitsScene
assets: `assets/collect.mp3`: Sound effect for collecting a benefit
objectives: Familiarize employees with the range of benefits offered by the company.
Reinforce the understanding of each benefit through interactive engagement.
Encourage exploration and retention of important employment information.

scenes.name: SecurityScene
assets: `assets/puzzle_piece.png`: Image for puzzle pieces representing security policies
`assets/lock.png`: Used as a decorative item to reinforce security theme
objectives: Understand the importance of creating strong passwords
Recognize the necessity of two-factor authentication
Learn to identify and report suspicious emails
Emphasize the need to lock computers when unattended
Reinforce the policy of not sharing credentials
Highlight the requirement for annual security training
